answers.answer: Moisture has little or nothing to do with warts.  Based on your description, I am not at all sure that every single bump you have is a wart.  Rather than keep irritating yourself with Condylox, I think you should bring any new bump to the attention of your dermatologist for proper diagnosis and treatment.  Warts can of course recur, but not in my experience as often and regularly as you say is happening to you.  I suspect that you are overtreating yourself, and in the process causing yourself needless discomfort and anxiety.Take care.Dr. Rockoff

title: continuous genital warts
